00034 #include <exception>
00035 #include <iostream>
00036 #include <cerrno>
00037 #include <unistd.h>
00038 #include <deque>
00039 
00040 #include "cvq.h"
00041 
00042 using namespace std;
00043 
00044 const char *me = NULL;
00045 /*
00046  *
00047  */
00048 void usage()
00049 {
00050     cerr<<"usage: "<<me<< " [options] (e-mail entry's_id){1,}"<<endl
00051         <<"-q\tquiet mode, only first e-mail is processed"<<endl
00052         <<endl
00053         <<"Delete action assiociated with user's mailbox."<<endl
00054         <<"Warning: some options must be present for valid processing of"<<endl
00055         <<"delivieries, etc. Use at your own risk."<<endl;
00056 }
00057 
00058 /*
00059  *
00060  */
00061 int main(int ac, char **av)
00062 {
00063     me = *av;
00064     try {
00065             int opt;
00066             bool quiet=false;
00067             while( (opt=getopt(ac,av,"qh")) != -1 ) {
00068                     switch(opt) {
00069                     case 'q':
00070                             quiet=true;
00071                             break;
00072                     default:        
00073                     case '?':
00074                     case 'h':
00075                             usage();
00076                             return(1);
00077                     }
00078             }
00079             ac -= optind;
00080             av += optind;
00081             if( 1 > ac || ac % 2 ) {
00082                     usage();
00083                     return(1);
00084             }
00085 
00086             cvq *vq(cvq::alloc());
00087 
00088             uint8_t ret;
00089             char *atpos = NULL;
00090 
00091             if(quiet) ac=2;
00092 
00093             for(int i=0; i < ac; i+=2 ) {
00094                     atpos = rindex(av[i], '@');
00095                     if(!quiet) cout<<av[i]<<": ";
00096                     if( atpos ) {
00097                             *atpos++ = '\0';
00098                             ret = vq->udot_rm(atpos, av[i], "", av[i+1]);
00099                             if(ret) {
00100                                     if(!quiet)
00101                                             cout<<vq->err_report()<<endl;
00102                                     else return(ret);
00103                             } else {
00104                                     if(!quiet)
00105                                             cout<<"Entry was removed"<<endl;
00106                                     else return 0;
00107                             }
00108                     } else {
00109                             if( ! quiet ) cout<<"invalid e-mail"<<endl;
00110                             else return 1;
00111                     }
00112             }
00113     } catch( const exception & e ) {
00114             cerr << "exception: " << e.what() << endl;
00115             return 1;
00116     }
00117     return 0;
00118 }
